sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Modal, Button, Row, Col, FormControl } from "react-bootstrap"; import "../../styles/screens/GroupsScreens.css"; function ExpenseDetailPopup({ show, onClose, expense }) { const [updatedDescription, setUpdatedDescription] = useState( expense.description ); const [userAmounts, setUserAmounts] = useState({}); if (!expense) { return null; } return (
Expense Details
Payer:

{expense.payer.name}

Amount Paid:

{expense.amount}

Date:

{expense.date}

Description:

{expense.description}

Expense Distribution
{expense.expense_details.map((detail) => (
{detail.user.name} {detail.user.id}  owes  ${detail.amount_owed}
))}
); } export default ExpenseDetailPopup;
